byline.original: By HWAIDA SAAD and RICK GLADSTONE

lead_paragraph: The son of Col. Moammar el-Qaddafi may have been illegally brought to Lebanon against his will in a plot involving the son of a colleague who vanished with Moussa al-Sadr in Libya in 1978, officials said.

headline.main: Mystery of Missing Lebanese Cleric Deepens
headline.print_headline: Mystery of Missing Lebanese Cleric Deepens

snippet: The son of Col. Moammar el-Qaddafi may have been illegally brought to Lebanon against his will in a plot involving the son of a colleague who vanished with Moussa al-Sadr in Libya in 1978, officials said.
